description: The view contains columns that provide EHI related filtering information for transactions.

columns.name: ETR_ID
columns.description: A transaction's unique internal identification number.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The internal identification number of the patient record with which the row's transaction has been associated. This field is always populated for charge transactions.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper for this transaction.
